sync.injection:
NC-9.4 — SYNC

Φ = 0.442379 Wb (B=0.673 T, A=0.765 m², θ=0.537 rad)

Magnetic flux Φ=0.442379 Wb estimated from B, A and orientation θ to characterize induction performance. This formula is applied to protocol/anohub_sync_v2/index.html because the filename indicates the sub-topic 'sync', making the parameters relevant for local diagnostics.

runner.injection:
NC-9.4 — RUNNER

M = 383.37 N·m · η = 0.753

Torque M=383.37 N·m and efficiency η=0.753 capture mechanical loading and conversion efficiency on the runner. This formula is applied to turbine_friend/francis_emergency_protocols/index.html because the filename indicates the sub-topic 'runner', making the parameters relevant for local diagnostics.

NC-9.4 — INLET

H = 99.6 m

Selected head H=99.6 m to parameterize flow energy available at the inlet/penstock. This formula is applied to turbine_friend/francis_h/francis_sop_penstock/index.html because the filename indicates the sub-topic 'inlet', making the parameters relevant for local diagnostics.
